mapper.sql: id, native_id, id_type, external_org, external_id, remark, status, create_time, update_time
mapper.insert:
insert into edu_base_id_pivot
id,
native_id,
id_type,
external_org,
external_id,
remark,
status,
create_time,
update_time,

mapper.update:
update edu_base_id_pivot
native_id = #{nativeId,jdbcType=BIGINT},
id_type = #{idType,jdbcType=TINYINT},
external_org = #{externalOrg,jdbcType=TINYINT},
external_id = #{externalId,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
remark = #{remark,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
status = #{status,jdbcType=TINYINT},
create_time = #{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
update_time = #{updateTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
where id = #{id,jdbcType=BIGINT}

update edu_base_id_pivot set native_id = #{nativeId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, id_type = #{idType,jdbcType=TINYINT}, external_org = #{externalOrg,jdbcType=TINYINT}, external_id = #{externalId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, remark = #{remark,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, status = #{status,jdbcType=TINYINT}, create_time = #{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, update_time = #{updateTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP} where id = #{id,jdbcType=BIGINT}
mapper.select: SELECT stu.id stuId, c.id classId, c.class_name className, external_id cardNo, stu.stu_name stuName, stu.stu_nickname stuNickname FROM edu_base_id_pivot bip INNER JOIN base_student stu ON native_id = stu.id INNER JOIN base_class c ON c.class_year = stu.stu_enrl_year WHERE bip.STATUS = 0 GROUP BY stu.id
